scripts.postinstall: echo "All dependencies were installed sucessfully ✅ You can now run tests by typing: npm test"
scripts.clean: echo "❌ Cleaning the reports and downloads folders" && rimraf ./allure-report/* && rimraf ./allure-results/* && rimraf test-results/* && rimraf report/* && rimraf playwright-report/* && echo "✅ All reports folders cleaned!"
scripts.format: echo Formatting the code 👀 ⌛ && prettier --write . && echo "✅ Code formatted, ready to commit!"
scripts.lint: echo Linting the code 👀 ⌛ && eslint --ignore-pattern "allure-report" --fix && echo "✅ Code linted, ready to commit!"
scripts.check: npm run format && npm run lint
